name: Paint-astic
description: Paint-astic is a Pogo Painter-like game but without power-up. In this game, players will compete to get the highest points in the given time. Player can move with grid-based movement inside an 8x8 arena. Every time the player moves, they will leave a mark on the tiles they landed. Player score points by collecting the Item Collect Point that convert all the player marked tiles into points.
